text: Hey Emma sorry I've gone off on my own for a bit, I've been every busy and had quite a difficult time last semester. A lot of my lectures had been trying to get me to change my idea to a simple one but I know I can do it so I'm just doing my thing really heres a link to my finished animatic <https://vimeo.com/379627419|https://vimeo.com/379627419>  I've got to animate it this semester

attachments.title: Animatic for FMP
attachments.video_html: <iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/379627419?autoplay=1&app_id=122963" width="400" height="225" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen title="Animatic for FMP"></iframe>

text: Let me know what you think :blush:

Is there a duration that you need to do?? Myself and one of our creative directors have just had a look and think that you need a bit more of a set up. We certainly don't need to simplify the idea but make the story a little more clear... maybe a slate of type that says the people prayed to the dragons... or that the dead body needs a little more context? Its only really when the dragons set to work does it become more clear. Stylistically the dragons are beautiful!
It can be as long as I want but it's suggested we don't go over 4 minutes
Keep it simple then, add a slate up front thats beautifully designed to help set it up... ? Are you having any VO? You should be really proud. It is going to look stunning.
I'm thinking a slate would be cool, I could design it like an old scroll?
And thank you a lot of effort as gone into it haha, I've just gotta stay on top it and finish it so I can prove myself

Nice! Looking back at the images you have shared with me, the dragons looked amazing on the canvas texture which may tie in with the scroll? Or not! I am a producer not a creative so tell me to do one!! HA!

You don't ever need to prove yourself to anyone. If you know you can do it - that is enough. Its a funny old business where it all comes down to our creative preferences. You need to get used to making your ideas a little bit worse because of the client feedback that you get... 20 years later it happens on every job! We call it the client mangle here.
If you ever want creative feedback from our guys, let me know and they certainly will x
Thank you, youre a real help :blush: it's good to get the advice from an outside perspective
That is what I am here for! Literally get in touch if there is ANYTHING we can help with. There is not just me, I have a whole studio to talk to here and contacts in music / audio and all industry x
